hero.headline: Project Support Logistics & Transportation
hero.subhead: End-to-end support including equipment rentals, oil & gas services, shipping, and customs clearance for major projects across Bangladesh.

home.aboutSnippet: SHAMOLIMA has been providing comprehensive Project Support Services in Bangladesh since 1983. The company specializes in logistics, engineering, and project materials support for industries including oil and gas, power, energy, telecommunications, and infrastructure. It delivers high-quality professional consultancy, equipment rentals, transportation, shipping, customs clearance, and manpower solutions throughout Bangladesh.

comprehensiveServices.title: Industry Expertise
comprehensiveServices.description: Decades of specialized experience in handling complex project cargo for energy, infrastructure, telecommunications, and industrial sectors.

comprehensiveServices.title: Tariff Classification
comprehensiveServices.description: Expert classification services aligned with international Harmonized System codes to ensure accurate duties and regulatory compliance.

comprehensiveServices.title: Import/Export Customs Management
comprehensiveServices.description: End-to-end customs brokerage covering documentation, declaration filing, duty payment, and compliance with all local and international regulations.

comprehensiveServices.title: Post-liquidation Handling
comprehensiveServices.description: Comprehensive support for post-clearance audits, refunds, amendments, and dispute resolution to protect your interests and ensure compliance.

comprehensiveServices.title: Regulatory Compliance & Risk Management
comprehensiveServices.description: Proactive monitoring of trade regulations, risk assessment, and strategic planning to minimize delays and ensure seamless border crossing.

freightForwarding.title: Expert Freight Forwarding Services
freightForwarding.description: We offer industry-leading logistics tailored for project cargo, ensuring safe, timely, and cost-effective delivery across all modes of transport.

services.title: Multimodal Freight Management
services.description: We offer end-to-end multimodal logistics for global and local project cargo. Our expertise spans air, sea, inland waterways, and road transport, ensuring seamless coordination from mother vessel to final destination, backed by our own shipping and customs licenses.

services.title: Cargo Handling Expertise
services.description: With decades of experience, we expertly manage heavy lift, oversized, and sensitive cargo. Our trained teams and specialized equipment ensure safe handling, reducing risk and project downtime. From lashing to final positioning, we prioritize safety and precision at every step.

services.title: Freight Position & Negotiation
services.description: Leveraging our long-standing relationships with global carriers and inland providers, we negotiate competitive freight rates and secure priority positioning. This enables cost-effective logistics planning and better project budgeting.

services.title: Shipment Tracking & Communication
services.description: Utilize our advanced tracking systems and dedicated support teams to monitor cargo movement in real time. We provide regular updates on vessel arrivals, port handling, customs status, and land transportï¿½ensuring transparency, accountability, and peace of mind throughout the journey.

services.title: Fleet & Transportation
services.description: We operate a fleet of over 200 assets including hydraulic trailers, lowbed trailers, forklifts, cranes, and barges. Our vessels are maintained to the highest standards and staffed by certified operators, ready to handle diverse cargo across challenging terrains and waterways.

advantages.title: Licensed Professionals
advantages.description: Our team comprises licensed customs brokers, certified freight forwarders, and industry experts committed to delivering compliant, high-quality service.

advantages.title: Value-Added Services
advantages.description: Beyond basic logistics, we offer warehousing, packaging, labeling, insurance coordination, and cargo consolidationï¿½streamlining your supply chain in one integrated solution.

advantages.title: Responsive Teams
advantages.description: With 24/7 operations and dedicated account managers, we are always ready to respond, troubleshoot, and adapt to urgent project needs and shifting requirements.

advantages.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
advantages.description: We leverage modern TMS platforms, digital tracking tools, and data analytics to optimize routes, predict delays, and deliver actionable insights that enhance project efficiency.

advantages.title: Efficient Processes
advantages.description: Streamlined workflows, pre-approved templates, and SOPs reduce paperwork and bureaucracy, helping you clear customs faster and get cargo on-site ahead of schedule.

advantages.title: Global Trade Compliance
advantages.description: Constant legal and regulatory monitoring ensures we stay current with ever-changing trade rules. We proactively guide clients through sanctions, tariffs, and regulatory frameworks.

advantages.title: Personalized Client Service
advantages.description: We build tailored solutions and dedicated project coordination, ensuring each client gets the exact support and communication style that suits their workflow and culture.

advantages.title: Sustainable Practices
advantages.description: Committed to minimizing environmental impact, we optimize routes to reduce emissions, engage in responsible waste management, and pursue green certifications and partnerships.

about.pageIntro: Since 1983, Shamolima Limited has been a pioneering force in integrated project logistics and support across Bangladesh. With decades of unparalleled experience, we specialize in delivering complex solutions for energy, infrastructure, and industrial sectors.
